Interface DGIntel

public interface DGIntel

This interface is designed to give a framework for all intelligence modules working with a character. In other words, each intelligence should perform the following actions in some way shape or form. This can be intelligent problem-solving, or it can be as simple as throwing some menus on the screen to prompt a human player.

Version:
0.1 Java
Author:
Evan Hildreth, root -1 Entertainment

Method Detail

ChooseAttack

public short ChooseAttack(DGBattle battle)
Chooses the special attack for the character to perform
Parameters:
battle - DGBattle the character is acting in
Returns:
index in character's GetAttack(short) method

ChooseAttackVictim

public short ChooseAttackVictim(DGBattle battle,
                                DGAttack attack)
Chooses the victim for the character to attack. This can include any character in the given battle. The intel module must make sure the attacking character has enough MP to perform the attack.
Parameters:
battle - DGBattle the character is acting in
attack - attack the character is using
Returns:
index in the battle's GetFromQueue(short) method

ChooseCommand

public short ChooseCommand(DGBattle battle)
Chooses the action for the character to perform
Parameters:
battle - DGBattle the character is acting in
Returns:
action for character to perform

ChooseItem

public short ChooseItem(DGBattle battle)
Chooses an item for the character to use. Although not required, it is recommended that the intel module make sure the item can be used at the time before attempting to use it.
Parameters:
battle - DGBattle the character is acting in
Returns:
index in the character's team's GetItem(short) method

ChooseItemVictim

public short ChooseItemVictim(DGBattle battle,
                              DGItem itm)
Chooses a character for the character to use the given item on. Although not required, it is recommended that the intel module make sure the item can be used at the time before attempting to use it.
Parameters:
battle - DGBattle the character is acting in
itm - item the character is using
Returns:
index in battle's GetFromQueue(short) method

ChooseSummons

public short ChooseSummons(DGBattle battle)
Chooses a monster for the character to summon. This is only useful for certain types of characters; all others should return -1 instead. Those that can summon, it should return the index of the monster to be summoned.
Parameters:
battle - DGBattle the character is acting in
Returns:
index in character's GetSummon(short) method
